name: Digital Frontier - V1.0 [Pre-Alpha WIP] - Tron Open World Non Profit Fan-Game
name_original: Digital Frontier - V1.0 [Pre-Alpha WIP] - Tron Open World Non Profit Fan-Game
description:
Digital Frontier Ver 1.0 [Pre-Alpha] is a Completely Free & Open Fan-Game based on the World of Tron Legacy and is meant to Act as a Non Canon "What If" Scenario if the Grid was Found Post Legacy and Continued on.

 I'll Be Updating this project periodically until I decide I've had enough fun with this or if enough people like it and add fuel to the fire via their Ideas and such, I'm totally down for Input and Ideas.

That's the nice thing about these projects, Without the Possibility of Profit there's no Reason to Hold back, So seriously Message me your Ideas and Such, If I dig it you may just see it in world. 

This Project is Meant to Be Free for All and Acts as a Publicly Available Tribute to Tron & Tron Legacy - By a Fan for the Fans 💖And In The Spirit of Flynn Himself 🙏

Tron & All Other Related Works are The Sole Property of Disney - No Infringement Intended - All Works Are Non-Profit & Meant to Act as a Tribute and Example of my Work / Ability to Keep True to an IP while taking it in different directions.  

The Core Controls are 

#1 Key : Program Mode

#2 Key : Cycle Mode

Throw Disc : Primary Mouse Button

Recall Disc : Secondary Mouse Button

Backspace Key - (When Standing In I/O Portal with Portal Light Active) : Exit Game

Program Movement : 

WASD : Move 
Mouse : Look
Spacebar : Jump

Cycle Movement : 

W,D  : Raise / Lower Throttle
Q/E & Left Arrow / Right Arrow : Turn Left / Right Respectively)
Spacebar : Brake

Everything else you get to Figure out for yourself(that's part of the fun) More to Be Added, More Programs, AI, Props, Items, Tools & More await you in the Digital Frontier. Enjoy 

My Portfolio : https://syntheon.artstation.com/

My Patreon : https://www.patreon.com/AboveBasicGames

DISCLAIMERS(Please Read) :

***THIS PROJECT IS COMPLETLEY UNOFFICIAL AND IS NOT SUPPORTED OR ENDORESED BY DISNEY OR ANY OTHER AFFIILATES***

***THIS PROJECT IS NON PROFIT - OPEN AND MEANT ONLY AS A LOVING TRIBUTE TO THE SERIES THAT INSPIRED ME TO START 3D DESIGN AND DEVELOPMENT IN 2010***

***TO DISNEY : PLEASE DONT SUE ME - THIS PROJECT IS NON PROFIT AND NOT DESIGNED, INTENDED OR BUILT TO COMPETE OR IN ANY WAY NEGATIVLEY IMPACT ANY DISNEY IP OR BRAND WHATSOEVER***

***TO DISNEY (Continued) : I AM A SOLO ARTIST WORKING FROM HOME & MOONLIGHTING AS AN INDIE DEV AND HAVE NOTHING WORTH YOUR LEGAL TEAMS TIME TO TAKE - HOWEVER I AM TOTALLY A JOINER SO IF DISNEY OR ANY RELATED DOES SEE THIS AND FEELS I HAVE BEEN TRUE TO THEIR BRAND AND THEMES I WOULD BE MORE THAN HAPPY TO DISCUSS EMPLOYMENT SO LONG AS DISNEY DECIDES NOT TO SMITE ME PRIOR ***

***ALSO TO DISNEY : I FORGIVE YOU FOR CANCELING TRON UPRISING AND THAT TOOK MORE EFFORT THAN THIS ENTIRE PROJECT BTW - SUCH A GREAT SHOW 💖 SENDING LOVE***
